T02D2132:178a-1: shr'i dva ya bha ta ra ya ksha s'a dha nam /
T02D2132:178a-3: gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2132:178a-4: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2132:178a-5: gang gi bka' sdod 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D2132:178b-0: gzhon nu @178b khros pa rngams pa'i tshul //
T02D2132:178b-1: gnod sbyin rgyal po nor sbyin dang //
T02D2132:178b-2: grags chen 'jigs pa mkhas pas bsgrubs //
T02D2132:178b-3: dur khrod la sogs ya nga bar //
T02D2132:178b-4: 'jig rten mgon po'i ltas mthong bas //
T02D2132:178b-5: de nyid rig pa dran byas la //
T02D2132:178b-6: tshar gcod rjes su 'dzin pa yis //
T02D2132:178b-7: byang chub sems gnyis yang dag bsgom//
T02D2132:178b-8: stong dang snying rje dbyer med las //
T02D2132:178b-9: rang nyid spyan ras gzigs khor bsgom //
T02D2132:178b-10: zhabs mthil 'khor lo'i h'um gnyis las //
T02D2132:178b-11: ri rab byang nas gnod sbyin dgug /'dam skyes thod pa dbugs bral gyi //
T02D2132:178b-12: gdan ni g-yas dang g-yon bsams la //
T02D2132:178b-13: de steng zar ma li khri'i mdog / h'um las gnod sbyin gnyis gzugs blta //
T02D2132:178b-14: bsad gri tsatti g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D2132:178b-15: de bzhin rnga chen mgo phyed 'dzin //
T02D2132:178b-16: rus pa rin chen stag lpags brgyan //
T02D2132:178b-17: khro zhing zhi la rab tu mdzes //
T02D2132:178b-18: mchod cing byin rlabs dbang bskur dang //
T02D2132:178b-19: rgyas gdab bka' la gdags pa dang //
T02D2132:178b-20: dam tshig brjod cing bskul ba dang //
T02D2132:178b-21: thams cad bdag po'i bka' yis bya //
T02D2132:178b-22: dkar dmar ba dan gyis mtshan pa'i //
T02D2132:178b-23: dkar dmar gtor ma gnyis bshams la //
T02D2132:178b-24: rang sngags 'bru gsum ldan pa yis //
T02D2132:178b-25: bdud rtsir bsgyur la thog mar sbyin //
T02D2132:178b-26: de rjes 'gro la phan yid kyis //
T02D2132:178b-27: nor 'phel gnod sbyin srog snying ni //
T02D2132:178b-28: snying gar bkod la 'dod pas bzlas //
T02D2132:178b-30: aom a'a:h'um kam badzra k'a la ma h'a dha nam h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2132:178b-31: gnod sbyin k'a la'i snying po'o //
T02D2132:178b-32: de bzhin phyogs bcur grags 'dod pas //
T02D2132:178b-33: gnyis pa'i snying gar 'bab pa'i sngags //
T02D2132:178b-34: phyogs bcur snang byed gsal byas la //
T02D2132:178b-36: aom a'a:h'um bam badzra bi ka la ma h'a k'i rti h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2132:178b-37: gnod sbyin pa ka la'i snying po'o //
T02D2132:178b-38: yig 'bru'i grangs kyis khrir bsnyen la //
T02D2132:178b-39: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad sngon 'gros //
T02D2132:178b-40: mgon pos srog snying dbang mdzad de //
T02D2132:178b-41: las sgrub sngags ni de rjes so //
T02D2132:178b-42: aom a'a:hr'i:shr'i k'a la ma ma dha na pushtim ku ru ye h'um sv'a h'a //
T02D2132:178b-43: gnod sbyin k'a la'i las sngags so //
T02D2132:178b-44: aom a'a:hr'i:shr'i bi k'a la ma ma pra siddham spha ra ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2132:178b-45: gnod sbyin bi ka li'i las sngags so //
T02D2132:178b-46: gal te 'di dag khro byed nas //
T02D2132:178b-47: bsgo ba'i las myur mi byed na //
T02D2132:178b-48: dpa' mo ral pa gcig khros pas //
T02D2132:178b-49: bdun phrag bdun du gzir bar bya //
T02D2132:179a-1: po rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D2132:179a-3: rkun pos rnyed pa'i nor bzhin du //
T02D2132:179a-4: 'bad de gsang bas bsgrub par bya //
T02D2132:179a-5: dpal gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs //
T02D2132:179a-6: slob dpon aa ji mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2132:179a-8: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi tra a'a nand'i
T02D2132:179a-9: phrin las kyi lha'i rigs gnubs lo ts'a ba byams
